name: Robot Rush (Seth01Master)
description:
THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT! NEW UPDATES COMING SOON!

Robot Rush is a First-Person-Shooter game, where you play as a robot who's only goal is to find and destroy all other robots.

You are given 3 weapons from your manufacturer:

1. Gun

Just a normal ol' gun. Does 25 damage per shot, with a fire rate of 5 shots per second.

2. Flamethrower

A large flamethrower that shoots large bursts of fire out the front. Does 10 damage with a fire rate of 10 shots per second.

3. Knife

A very sharp knife which kills the target in one slice. Attack rate is 1 slice per second.

Now get out there and kill those robots!

This game is best played in a voice chat with friends (e.g. discord), but a normal chat UI is coming soon!
